# ==(_:_:)

**Operator**

Indicates whether two targets are equal.

## Declaration

```swift
static func == (lhs: BodyTrackingComponent.Target, rhs: BodyTrackingComponent.Target) -> Bool
```

## Parameters

- **lhs**: The first target to compare.
- **rhs**: The second target to compare.

## Return Value

A Boolean value set to `true` if the two targets are equal.

## Comparing targets

- **hash(into:)**: Hashes the essential components of the target by feeding them into the given hash function.

items.description: Hashes the essential components of the target by feeding them into the given hash function.
items.name: hash(into:)
